"Special Training: Episode 3":
"This is an exercise VR Training quest.
Aim for the final area within the time
limit. This will put you through
various events encountered by ARKS,
including the revival of the
[Profound Darkness].
Plan your party's abilities carefully.

Time Limit: 15 minutes

"We'll be starting the transfer soon! The goal is to complete each area within the time limit."
"We had adjusted this VR training quest based on the previous data gathered."
"Good luck and don't let your guard down!"
